original: Yo kusalaṁ dhammaṁ bhāveti so akusalaṁ dhammaṁ pajahatīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ kusalam dhammam bhāveti saḥ akusalam dhammam pajahati iti āmantā

original: Yo vā pana akusalaṁ dhammaṁ pajahati so kusalaṁ dhammaṁ bhāvetīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana akusalam dhammam pajahati saḥ kusalam dhammam bhāveti iti āmantā

original: Yo kusalaṁ dhammaṁ na bhāveti so akusalaṁ dhammaṁ nappajahatīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ kusalam dhammam na bhāveti saḥ akusalam dhammam na pajahati iti āmantā

original: Yo vā pana akusalaṁ dhammaṁ nappajahati so kusalaṁ dhammaṁ na bhāvetīti? Āmantā …pe….
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana akusalam dhammam na pajahati saḥ kusalam dhammam na bhāveti iti āmantā pe
